text: allaah hee praanon ko unakee mrtyu ke samay grast kar leta hai aur jisakee mrtyu nahin aaee use usakee nidra kee avastha mein (grast kar leta hai) . phir jisakee mrtyu ka faisala kar diya hai use rok rakhata hai. aur doosaron ko ek niyat samay tak ke lie chhod deta hai. nishchay hee isamen kitanee hee nishaaniyaan hai soch-vichaar karanevaalon ke lie
